docs.title: Suno AI: Song Tags
docs.text:
Welcome to Song Tags for Suno AI.

Song Tags for Suno Ai is on GitHub

Got other song tags or usage information to share with Suno creators? Please see the contribution page.

docs.title: Song Templates
docs.text: Song Templates

docs.title: Basic
docs.text:
[Verse]
Place verse 1 content here

[Chrous]
Place chrous 1 content here

[Verse]
Place verse 2 content here

[Chrous]
Place chrous 1 content here

[End]

docs.title: Basic+
docs.text:
[Intro]
Place intro content matter here

[Hook]

[Verse]
Place verse 1 content here

[Chrous]
Place chrous 1 content here

[Bridge]
Place bridge content here

[Upbeat Verse]
Place verse 2 content here

[Build]

[Chrous]
Place chrous 1 content here

[Soft Hook]

[Outro]
Place outro content here

[Fade To End]

docs.title: Index
docs.text:
Song Tags

Click a song tag below or select from the navigation bar to see more details and possible variations.

Suno AI: V3.alpha

docs.title: Common Tags
docs.text:
• Intro 
    [Intro]
  • Verse 
    [Verse]
  • Pre-Chrous 
    [Pre-Chrous]
  • Chrous 
    [Chrous]
  • Hook 
    [Hook]
  • Break 
    [Break]
  • Build 
    [Build]
  • Interlude 
    [Interlude]
  • Refrain 
    [Refrain]
  • Outro 
    [Outro]
  • Fade Out 
    [Fade Out]
  • End 
    [End]

docs.title: Special Tags
docs.text:
• Big Finish
  • Bass Drop
  • Narration
  • Shout
  • Diva Solo
  • Gospel Choir
  • Primal Scream
  • Gregorian Chant
  • Spoken Word
  • Sprechgesang

AI and Song Tags

Some or none of these tags, may or may not work in your song project. Sometimes this is due to the style of the song, or just pure hallucination on the AI's part. For more information see this link.

docs.title: Break
docs.text: Suno AI: V3.alpha

docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
Prompt the AI to consider this section a break in the song.

[Break]

docs.title: Variations
docs.text: [STYLE Break]

docs.title: Percussion
docs.text: [Percussion Break]

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
BasicVariation

[Percussion Break]

Take It Further

These are only a few examples of variations, be sure to experiment with your own!

docs.title: Notes
docs.text:
Nothing notable.

Some or none of these tags, may or may not work in your song project. Sometimes this is due to the style of the song, or just pure hallucination on the AI's part. For more information see this page.

docs.title: Chrous
docs.text: Suno AI: V3.alpha

docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
Prompt the AI to consider this section a chrous in the song.

[Chrous]

docs.title: Variations

docs.title: Happy
docs.text: [Happy Chrous]

docs.title: Powerpop
docs.text: [Powerpop Chrous]

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
BasicVariation 
[Chrous]
I love the rain
Let's play in the rain

[Happy Chrous]
I'm a tree
Let me be

Take It Further

These are only a few examples of variations, be sure to experiment with your own!

docs.title: Special Tags
docs.text:
Special Tags

Suno AI: V3.alpha

docs.title: Big Finish
docs.text:
Indicates a big finish to the song.

[Big Finish]

docs.title: Bass Drop
docs.text:
Indicates a bass drop in the song.

[Bass Drop]

docs.title: Narration
docs.text:
Indicates narration.

[Narration]
Some text would go here

docs.title: Spoken Word
docs.text:
Indicates a spoken word section in the song.

[Spoken Word]
Some text would go here

docs.title: Shout
docs.text:
Indicates a shout in the song.

[Shout]

docs.title: Diva Solo

[Diva Solo]
